casebody.data:
BRYSON & BOWEN
v.
STATE ATTORNEY GEN. No. 640P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005.

Lester Daniel Bryson, Pro Se.

William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for Attorney General et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of September 2005 by Plaintiffs for Ruling on Discretionary Review or Rule to Show Cause Why Not and Motion to Compel:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
